title: User Friendly Lamps
description: Ready-made lamp pack for your game. Intuitive blueprint controls allow you to turn lights on & off with the click of a button, change the light color and more! Just drag and drop the blueprints included in this package into your level and you're done!
longDescription:
UPDATE v1.1
NEW dynamically adjustable String Lights!
Documentation now included in PDF format.

This lamp pack contains 12 blueprint systems that have been designed to provide game developers and potentially archviz aficionados with a hassle-free way of placing lamps and lights in their scenes. Each blueprint system comes with a number of settings in the construction script, 2 to 4 LODs per mesh, and a carefully tweaked light source to match your expectations! There's even a torch in there!

If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to leave a comment or drop an e-mail to uflamps@gmail.com and I will get back to you immediately!
technicalDetails:
Physically-Based Rendering: Yes

Texture Size: 4096x4096

Collision: Yes, Auto-generated

Vertex Count: 342 - 28410 triangles

LODs: Yes, multiple LODs for each asset

Number of Meshes: 16 (12 Blueprint lamp systems)

Number of Materials: 14

Number of Textures: 44

Engine Compatibility: 4.13 - 4.18

Intended Platform: PC, Console

Platforms Tested: PC

Documentation Included: Yes

Important\Additional Notes: By default the LODBias of textures has been adjusted so that models have a reasonable texture resolution that perform well (no larger than 1024x1024), however if you want to go higher you can go into texture settings and change the texture resolution back to 4096x4096. All meshes and light sources are set to Moveable by default.


List of assets and some technical specifications:

Brooklyn Antique (Pendant lamp): 3x LODs, lowest LOD: 430 tris / LOD0: 1200 tris

Bronze Lantern: 3x LODs, lowest LOD: 888 tris / LOD0: 3888 tris

Large Chandelier: 4x LODs, lowest LOD: 3992 tris / LOD0: 28410 tris

Small Chandelier: 4x LODs, lowest LOD: 2288 tris / LOD0: 15962 tris

Desk Lamp: 4x LODs, lowest LOD: 342 tris / LOD0: 3076 tris

Floor Lamp: 3x LODs, lowest LOD: 766 tris / LOD0: 3072 tris

Industrial Lamp: 4x LODs, lowest LOD: 493 tris / LOD0: 2680 tris

Oil Lamp: 3x LODs, lowest LOD: 600 tris / LOD0: 2496 tris

Studio Lamp: 4x LODs, lowest LOD: 1176 tris / LOD0: 12036 tris

Torch: 3 LODs, lowest LOD: 398 tris / LOD0: 1594 tris

Cresset: 4 LODs, lowest LOD: 844 tris / LOD0: 3424 tris

+NEW String Lights: No LODs, automatic LODs are available as of 4.14
